name: Assault Force
overview: Assault Force is a 3D game similar to Battlezone. The player navigates an attack vehicle blowing up aliens and looking for fuel. Ground and air alien units attack the player. The original Atari version came with a special "Super Charger Power Booster" cartridge which has a math coprocessor used while running to achieve the 3D graphics. The game was later cracked and modified to not need the additional hardware.
